text: Lionnel Franck Djimgou Tchoumbou (born March 27, 1989 in Yaoundé) is a Cameroonian football player, who last played for FC Daugava. ==Club career== Tchoumbou began his career 1999 by Valencia CF and moved 2001 to Real Madrid, he played 7 years on youth side from Madrid.Cameroun: Lionel Djimgou Tchoumbou – "C'est difficile d'arriver au Real Madrid" In July 2008 moved to Xerez CD, the club from Jerez, Andalusia loaned him in August 2008 for one year to CD San Fernando.Profile In July 2010 he was signed by the Latvian side FC Daugava. He played 5 matches there, scoring no goals and was released after the season. ==Personal life== He holds a Spanish passport. ==Notes== Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:Cameroonian footballers Category:Valencia CF players Category:Spanish people of Cameroonian descent Category:Xerez CD footballers Category:Spanish footballers Category:Naturalised citizens of Spain Category:Cameroonian emigrants to Spain Category:CD San Fernando players Category:Xerez CD B players Category:Sportspeople from Yaoundé Category:Cameroonian expatriate footballers Category:Spanish expatriate footballers Category:Cameroonian expatriate sportspeople in Latvia Category:Expatriate footballers in Latvia Category:FC Daugava players Category:Association football forwards
title: Lionnel Franck Djimgou
